attributes.action: deport foreign born criminals, regardless of citizenship
attributes.additional_details: If you commit an imprisonable offence and you were not born in this country, you have broken your obligations to your would-be adoptive country and there is no reason why the indigenous taxpayers should subsidise your continued stay in Britain. Foreign criminals and naturalised citizens who commit crimes should be stripped of British citizenship (if they have any) and made to serve their sentence abroad, followed by a lifetime ban from entering this country.
